content: अम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> [अमति अमितुं, अमित; <ab>Ved.</ab> pres. अमिति; अमीति] {@--1@} To go; to go to or towards. {@--2@} To serve, honour. {@--3@} To sound. {@--4@} To eat. {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} ( आमयति) {@--1@} To come upon, attack, afflict with sickness or pain from disease. {@--2@} To be ill or be afflicted or diseased. --With सं <ab>Ved.</ab> {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {1} to convince oneself of, ascertain. {2} to ally or connect oneself with. {@--3@} To fix or settle oneself.
